actions.text: On agreeing to the Lieu, Ted amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Lieu, Ted.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Lieu, Ted.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lieu, Ted amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B in House Report 116-16 to prohibit political appointees from using Federal funds to pay for travel on non- commercial, private, or chartered flights for official business. Exceptions are made if no commercial flight is available during the time at which travel is necessary. Any senior political appointee who travels on a non-commercial, private, or chartered flight under the above exception must submit a written statement to Congress certifying that no commercial flight was available.
